data.eml:eml: Morphological description of the pupa and fourth-instar larva and redescription of the adults of Psorophora (Psorophora) pallescens Edwards (Diptera: Culicidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stein, Marina, Laurito, Magdalena, Rossi, Gustavo Carlos, Almirón, Walter Ricardo (2009): Morphological description of the pupa and fourth-instar larva and redescription of the adults of Psorophora (Psorophora) pallescens Edwards (Diptera: Culicidae). Zootaxa 2306: 51-58, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.275397
